page.title: 15RECREATION IN BEDWORTH
page.content: {ELASTIC}-3 girls are needed to play.A piece of elastic is joined to form a circle.2 girls stand facing each other the elastic round their ankles.A 3rd girl stands with one leg between the elastic,the other,outside.She then jumps,so that the leg which was inside is now outside,& vice versa.This is repeated 4 times.Then she jumps & lands with both legs inside,both outside & finally ON the elastic.A rhyme said during the jumping is:- "England,Ireland,Scotland,Wales;Inside Outside,Tread."If she makes a mistake her turn is over. {KERBIE}-A ball and 2 people are needed They stand on opposite sides of the road.The 1st person throws the ball at the opposite kerb.If the ball hits the kerb & bounces back,it's one point.If they miss,the 2nd person has a turn. The first to reach 10 points,wins.
